summary:
P2P BITCOIN TRADING platform - Non-custodial Bitcoin trading solution, we don’t hold your funds.

 7 YEARS - in business

 100+ - currencies

 50 000+ - deals closed

 100 000+ - registered users

 Secure - Multisig (P2SH) contracts

 NON-CUSTODIAL - You control the keys to the funds in escrow

 Anonymous - No verification required

 Transparent Fees - Trading fee split between buyer & seller, deducted from BTC amount

 Secured by Escrow - Control the keys to the funds in escrow through out the whole deal

 TESTNET - learn how to trade without risking actual money
